Id	Desc	LimitID	BonusID	MissionType	LogicType	LogicID	ScriptID	NextMissionID	AcceptDataID	CompleteDataID	DalityMissionTabID

#MAX_ID=1024;MAX_RECORD=1024;TableType=Hash;
